string.name: packageName
string.description: Package name for java clases.

string.name: namespace
string.description: Target namespace for the xml schema.

string.name: license
string.description: License text to be used for this model.

entity.name: HEntityData
entity.description: Data common to all entity like classes.

string.name: name
string.description: The name for this object, This value will be used to identify the entity withing the model, it will be the class and xml type name also.

string.name: extendsFrom
string.description: Entity that this object will extends from.

string.name: description
string.description: The description of this entity.

boolean.name: customizable
boolean.description: If this entity is customizable or not. If true a base class will be generated for this entity.

list.name: fields
list.description: A list of fields for this entity.

string.name: defaultValue
string.description: The default value for this field.

boolean.name: defaultValue
boolean.description: The default value for this field.

entity.name: HListField
entity.description: Represents a field that holds a collection of objects.

string.name: of
string.description: The type of the list represented by this field.

boolean.name: wrapper
boolean.description: If this fields needs to be wrapped.

entity.name: HEnumField
entity.description: Represents a field that holds an enumerator value.

string.name: type
string.description: The name of the enumerator for this field.

entity.name: HBasicField
entity.description: Root class for all the basic fields objects.

entity.name: HField
entity.description: Root class for all the fields objects.

string.name: name
string.description: The field name

string.name: description
string.description: The fiel description

boolean.name: readonly
boolean.description: If this field is read only.

entity.name: HListElement
entity.description: An element of a list field.

string.name: type
string.description: The entity or class this element maps to.

string.name: name
string.description: The name of the element.

string.name: description
string.description: If this field is required.

entity.name: HElementField
entity.description: A field that holds a reference to another entity of the model.

string.name: type
string.description: The name of the entity that this field refers to.

entity.name: HParentField
entity.description: Defines the parent of an entity.

string.name: name
string.description: The name of the parent field to be use.

string.name: type
string.description: The name of the entity or class the parent object must extends or implement.

entity.name: HEntity
entity.description: Represents an entity of the hierarchical model.

element.name: parent
element.description: The parent field of this entity.

entity.name: HEnum
entity.description: Represents an enumerator of the model, to be use as a source for the enumerators fields of the entitys.

string.name: name
string.description: The name of the enumerator, this value will identify the enumerator withing the model.

string.name: description
string.description: The description of the enumerator.

list.name: values
list.description: A list of values for this enumerator.

entity.name: HEnumValue
entity.description: An enumerator value, this class defines the constans of the object representing by the HEnum object.

string.name: name
string.description: The name of the value.

string.name: description
string.description: The description of the value.

enum.name: HFieldAccess
enum.description: Defines the type of access a field may have.

value.name: ATTRIBUTE
value.description: The field will be mapped from an xml attribute.

value.name: ELEMENT
value.description: The field will be mapped from an xml element.
